title: One Piece
review: I liked that the movie introduced a lot of characters and brought back Luffy and the pirate crew, it was really amazing for One Piece fans to be able to see this great movie on the big screen!
Awesome movie definitely the best One Piece movie out there

title: i think this is the best One Piece movie to date !
review: Honestly what did you expect from them to do in the 20th anniversary ? they blow everyone's mind , 10/10 !! love it .
